title: Documentation issue: zlib example in Overview incorrect
body:
by **jdoak@google.com**: 
http://golang.org/pkg/compress/zlib/

Under overview this example:

var b bytes.Buffer
w, err := zlib.NewWriter(&b)
w.Write([]byte("hello, world\n"))
w.Close()

The line "w, err := zlib.NewWriter(&b)" is incorrect, NewWriter() does not
return an error.

func NewWriter(w io.Writer) *Writer

This is in the current documentation as of 4/3/2013
